project_name.justification: The article title is 'Relevant Gold Buys Out Option Completing Acquisition of 700 Leased Hectares at its Flagship Golden Buffalo Project'.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified as 'Relevant Gold Corp. (TSXV:RGC)(OTCQB:RGCCF) ("Relevant Gold " or the "Company")'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the buyer is identified in the sign-off: 'On behalf of Relevant Gold Corp., Rob Bergmann, Chief Executive Officer'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The article states that Relevant Gold entered into a 'Purchase Agreement... to complete the acquisition of 88 BLM mining claims (700 ha) (the "Subject Property")'. This completes a buyout of a property previously held under a lease option, implying 100% interest is acquired.

primary_commodity.justification: The text describes a milestone payment related to gold: '...completion of a NI 43-101 compliant mineral resource estimate exceeding one million ounces of gold on the Subject Property...'

verified_article_link.justification: The article is titled 'Relevant Gold Buys Out Option Completing Acquisition of 700 Leased Hectares at its Flagship Golden Buffalo Project', which matches the project of interest.

currency.justification: The cash payments are explicitly denominated in US dollars: '...GBMC will receive (a) a US$1,000,000 cash payment...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total potential cash payments are the sum of three milestone payments: 'a US$1,000,000 cash payment', 'a US$1,000,000 cash payment', and 'a US$9,000,000 cash payment'.

share_payments_raw.justification: The text specifies the number of shares to be issued, but does not provide a total dollar value for the share payment.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The cash and share components of the payment are listed separately, not as a single combined value.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The total shares issued includes an upfront payment and a milestone payment: 'GBMC will receive (i) 1,500,000 common shares of the Company' and 'a US$1,000,000 cash payment and 500,000 common shares of the Company'.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned as part of the acquisition consideration.

option_payments_raw.justification: Options are mentioned but are part of a service agreement for new managers, not consideration for the property acquisition: 'As part of the service agreement, Mr. Hutchison and Mr. Tyra will each be issued 150,000 common share options...'

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction terms mention the number of shares issued, but not the price. Using the last traded price as a fallback, as seen in the detailed quote: 'Last: 0.36'.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text does not mention any exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text does not mention any monetary commitment for exploration.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The seller retains a Net Smelter Royalty as part of the deal: 'GBMC will receive... (iii) a 3% net smelter return (NSR) royalty on the Subject Property.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The acquisition is for a specific portion of the larger property: '...completing the acquisition of 88 BLM mining claims (700 ha) (the "Subject Property") in the core of the Company's 3,766 hectare Golden Buffalo property...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is specified as hectares: '...acquisition of 88 BLM mining claims (700 ha)...'

resource_size.justification: The text does not contain a quantified mineral resource estimate. It only refers to a future potential resource as a milestone: 'upon the completion of a NI 43-101 compliant mineral resource estimate exceeding one million ounces of gold'.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and primary exchange are provided in the company's introduction: 'Relevant Gold Corp. (TSXV:RGC)(OTCQB:RGCCF)'.
